title.english: TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You

description:
The story follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl named Tsukasa. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girlfriend, but things take a turn for the worse when Nasa is hit by a car and unable to attend his entrance exams.

After Tsukasa helps the injured Nasa, he confesses his feelings to her, and she agrees to go out with him, but only if Nasa agrees to marry her first. A year later Nasa aces the entrance exams, but he decides to work a part time job and live by himself instead of going to school. After Nasa turns 18, Tsukasa re-appears, and their happy, romantic, and mysterious married life together begins.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: จะยังไงภรรยาของผมก็น่ารัก

tags.name: Marriage
tags.description: Centers around marriage between two or more characters.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Cohabitation
tags.description: Features two or more people who live in the same household and develop a romantic or sexual relationship.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hatakenjiro) | [Blog](http://blog.livedoor.jp/hajimemashite_maru/) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/15184753)

Kenjirou Hata is a Japanese manga author. He is notable for the creation of the series Hayate the Combat Butler. He likes to collect anime related items, such as figurines. He was once an assistant of [Kouji Kumeta](https://anilist.co/staff/97662/Kouji-Kumeta).  

He is married to the voice actress [Masumi Asano](https://anilist.co/staff/95077/Masumi-Asano).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/aho_boy)

Hiroshi Ikehata is a Japanese director, episode director and storyboard artist.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/heichin26)

Kazuho Hyoudou is a Japanese anime screenwriter and light novel writer. Currently a freelancer. He graduated from the Department of Film and Visual Arts in Osaka University of Arts. He previously worked as a production manager at [Sunrise](https://anilist.co/studio/14/Sunrise). Later debuting as a screenwriter on [Shutsugeki! Machine Robo Rescue](https://anilist.co/anime/3098/Shutsugeki-Machine-Robo-Rescue/) in 2003. Since then, he has written scripts for several anime series. His more recent notable works include [Tonikaku Kawaii](https://anilist.co/anime/116267/TONIKAWA-Over-The-Moon-For-You/) and [ReLIFE](https://anilist.co/anime/21049/ReLIFE/)

He has also worked as a scenario writer on the Xenoblade Chronicles series of video games by [Nintendo](https://anilist.co/staff/280450/Nintendo)

__Notable works outside anime:__

- Xenoblade Chronicles X (Video Game, 2015) (Scenario)
- Xenoblade Chronicles 2 (Video Game, 2017) (Scenario)
- Xenoblade Chronicles 3 (Video Game, 2022) (Scenario)

__[Profile (Gesshoku Kaigi)](https://gesshokukaigi.jp/about/)__

__Tomoyoshi Endou__, better known by alias Endou, is a Japanese guitarist, lyricist, composer, arranger and member of Gesshoku Kaigi.

__Height:__ 153 cm
__Agency:__ Racoon Dog

[Profile (Racoon Dog)](https://www.raccoon-dog.co.jp/talent/r09-kitou.html
) | [Official Site](https://kitoakari.com/) | [Twitter (Official)](https://twitter.com/kitoakari_staff/) | [Twitter (Personal)](https://twitter.com/kitoakari_1016/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kitoakari_staff/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCU_E2DHcyQu-Toohyd1vzRw)

A Japanese voice actress. She debuted in 2014, got her first main role in *Time Bokan 24* (2016), and has since received more leading roles. On October 16, 2019, her 25th birthday, she made her debut as a solo music artist under Pony Canyon. After the agency Pro-Fit shut down their operations, she joined the new agency Racoon Dog on 2022. 

**Non anime roles:**
- [Abukuma](https://anilist.co/character/228251/Abukuma), Hass, Isuzu, and Nagara - Azur Lane (VG)
- [Barbara](https://anilist.co/character/203315/Barbara-Pegg) - Genshin Impact (VG)
- [Silence](https://anilist.co/character/186429/Silence) - Arknights (VG)
- Rola - Shadowverse (VG)
- Sabrina - Memento Mori (VG)
- Ashley Graham - Resident Evil 4 Remake (VG)
- Pepper - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- [Celine](https://anilist.co/character/305904 ) - Fire Emblem Engage (VG)

__[Website](http://www.kanoerana.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kanoerana7) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kanoerana/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/kanoerana) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDKCyrXCr1W4zE-lOw7YBRQ) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@kanoerana)__

__KanoeRana__ is a Japanese vocalist and lyricist under record labels KABECHORO (2018–) and KURAMAE RECORDS (2019–), having previously been under TAISUKE RECORDS (2015–2016) and Warner Music Japan (2016–2018). She made her first major debut on August 31, 2016, when she released her first mini album titled Kanoe Sanjou.

She currently actively releases small songs and covers to both her twitter and tiktok, which have made her quite renown in recent times.

__[Profile (Gesshoku Kaigi)](https://gesshokukaigi.jp/about/)__

__Tomoyoshi Endou__, better known by alias Endou, is a Japanese guitarist, lyricist, composer, arranger and member of Gesshoku Kaigi.
